node.html: An intelligent AI-powered study companion that revolutionizes the learning experience through personalized assistance, smart content generation, and adaptive learning paths. Built with modern technologies to provide students with instant, contextual support for their academic journey. The platform has improved study efficiency by 70% through AI-generated summaries and helped 5,000+ students achieve better grades. Features include real-time question answering, automated study material generation, personalized learning recommendations, and progress tracking to help students achieve their academic goals more effectively.

An intelligent AI-powered assistant designed for classroom management and educational support. The system leverages advanced AI technologies to enhance the learning experience and provide automated assistance for both educators and students. Successfully reduced teacher response time by 85% with instant AI-powered answers and handled 10,000+ student queries with 92% satisfaction rate. Features include intelligent query handling, automated response generation, seamless integration with educational workflows, and streamlined classroom operations to improve overall educational efficiency.

Enhanced and optimized an AI assistant for Axess Logistique, improving domain-specific response accuracy and operational efficiency. The system features real-time agent handover capabilities and a comprehensive analytics dashboard for tracking performance metrics.

Developed an automated financial planning system that dynamically calculates savings amounts, contribution schedules, and achievement timelines based on user-defined financial goals and constraints.

Key Results: Reduced financial planning time by 70% through automated calculations • Achieved 95% user goal completion rate with smart reminders • Processed 1000+ financial scenarios with real-time timeline adjustments

Implemented an interactive calendar with real-time statistical dashboards for progress monitoring, allowing users to track their financial performance and milestone completion

A sophisticated partnership management platform designed to streamline business collaboration and relationship tracking. The system provides comprehensive tools for managing partnerships throughout their lifecycle, with features including automated status tracking, document management, and analytics dashboard with KPI tracking. Successfully increased partnership ROI tracking accuracy by 90% and managed 300+ active partnerships with automated workflows. Built with modern tech stack ensuring scalability and maintainability, featuring role-based access control and real-time collaboration capabilities.

A comprehensive management system for the Complexe Culturel Pilote des Jeunes that streamlined course management and booking processes. The system features an intuitive desktop interface built with JavaFX, real-time updates, and robust data management capabilities that improved operational efficiency by 40%.

A comprehensive eligibility assessment system designed to evaluate and validate potential business partnerships. This system automates the complex process of determining partnership compatibility and compliance with organizational requirements. Features include automated eligibility checks, customizable assessment criteria, document verification, detailed reporting capabilities, and a user-friendly interface for efficient decision-making.

A modern Flutter application for managing business partnerships with verification tracking, automated reminders, and comprehensive analytics. The app features real-time status monitoring, smart notifications for pending verifications and expirations, and an interactive analytics dashboard with visualizations. Successfully reduced partnership verification time by 60% and managed 500+ partnerships with zero missed renewals. Key features include automated archiving of expired partnerships, date validation to maintain data integrity, PDF export capabilities, and a beautiful Material Design 3 interface with dark/light theme support.
